title: Eisenhower National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Review lesson plans and curricula for preparing an education field trip or exploring Eisenhower and the 1950s in the classroom. All Curriculum Materials   FEATURED LESSON PLAN    Thaw in the Cold War Learn More     Field Trips Have your students visit the President's farm and join a ranger for one of the several education programs offered for grades 3 - 12. All Field Trips   PLAN YOUR FIELD TRIP    Molding of a Leader Learn More     Guest Speakers Invite a ranger to conduct our Ike and Civil Rights or Man of Many Hats character education program in your classroom. All Guest Speakers   INVITE A RANGER    Ike and Civil Rights Learn More
